title: Zoom takes on Apple’s Memoji with new virtual avatar feature for video calls
content:
Don’t want to show your face on yet another Zoom call? No worries! Zoom has introduced its new avatar feature today, so you can liven up your next meeting or webinar. As part of its Zoom 5.10 update, you can be a dog, rabbit, fox, cat, or cow, among other animals. 

more…

The post Zoom takes on Apple’s Memoji with new virtual avatar feature for video calls appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Zoom has introduced its new avatar feature today, aiming to liven up your next meeting or webinar with animal faces.
